Input.Expression: query.Select(doc => new Datum() {DataMember = doc.DataMember, Default = doc.Default, JsonProperty = doc.JsonProperty, JsonPropertyAndDataMember = doc.JsonPropertyAndDataMember, DataMemberAndJsonPropertyName = doc.DataMemberAndJsonPropertyName, JsonPropertyName = doc.JsonPropertyName})

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE {"dataMember": root["dataMember"], "Default": root["Default"], "jsonProperty": root["jsonProperty"], "jsonPropertyHasHigherPriority": root["jsonPropertyHasHigherPriority"], "dataMemberHasHigherPriority": root["dataMemberHasHigherPriority"], "jsonPropertyName": root["jsonPropertyName"]} FROM root
